title: Sri Lanka announces 1 hour to 2 hours 15 mins power cuts  from June 13-19
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka will impose power cuts of 1 hour to 2 hours and 15 minutes on a daily basis from June 13 to 19 Public Utilities Commission (PUCSL) Chairman Janaka Ratnayake said.
On June 13, all areas (ABCDEFGHIJKLPQRSTUVW) will have power cuts of 2 hours and 15 minutes between 8.30 am and 9.45 pm.
Between 6.00 am and 8.15 am, the Colombo City center could face a power cut of 2 hours and 15 minutes.
On June 14 – one-hour power cut will be implemented in areas under (ABCDEFGHIJKLPQRSTUVW) between 5.30 pm and 9.30 pm.
Between 6.00 am and 7.00 am, the Colombo City center could face a power cut of 2 hour and 15 minutes.
From June 15 – 18, areas under (ABCDEFGHIJKLPQRSTUVW) will have power cuts of 2 hours and 15 minutes between 5.30 pm and 9.30 pm.
Between 6.00 am and 8.15 am, the Colombo City center could face a power cut of 2 hour and 15 minutes.
On June 19, one-hour power cut will be implemented in areas under (ABCDEFGHIJKLPQRSTUVW) between 5.30 pm and 9.30 pm.
Between 6.00 am and 7.00 am, the Colombo City center could face a power cut of 2 hour and 15 minutes.
The state-run Ceylon Electricity Board said the supply interruption time and restoration time will be varied within 30 minutes as indicated above.
